task.title: Installing JMS Drivers
task.shortdesc: Before you use the JMS Consumer, install the JMS drivers for the implementation that you are using.

context.p: JMS Consumerinstalling driversFor example, to use the Oracle version of JMS, you need to install the Oracle JMS drivers: wljmsclient.jar and wlclient.jar. Or to use the ActiveMQ version, install all the ActiveMQ jars: activemq-all-*.jar.
For details on installing additional drivers, see .
